author: powercode
body:

comments.author: powercode
comments.body: The failure seems unrelated to my checkin

comments.author: powercode
comments.body: New version with listtext and tooltip "{id} - {name}"

comments.author: rkeithhill
comments.body: Keep in mind that the PowerShell extension for VSCode uses the TooltipText for the detail text in IntelliSense.  ListItemCompletion is used for sorting and the Label.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
@powercode can you please update the test with `'^\d+ - '`? Otherwise, the changes look good to me.
@rkeithhill do you have any concerns on the changes?

title: Add Name as tooltip when tab completing process ID
